ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 3rd day of October 2001, the petition for allowance of appeal is GRANTED, the order of the superior court is REVERSED and the case is REMANDED for a new trial in the Court of Common Pleas of Berks County. See Commonwealth v. Roxberry, 529 Pa. 160, 602 A.2d 826, 827 (1992).
